scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, with a halo and wounds from the crucifixion visible on his body, standing and holding a cross staff. He is gesturing with his right hand. Before him, a bearded man, also with a halo, kneels and looks up at Christ, his right hand reaching towards Christ's side. The figures are positioned within an architectural setting that includes arched openings and a tiled floor. Through an archway to the left, a landscape with a building and trees is visible. The overall scene is framed by an ornamental border.
